availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Organized at Fort Leavenworth. Mustered in July 1861. Commander(s): William Weer, Colonel Hampton P. Johnson, Lieutenant Colonel Ritchie, Lieutenant Colonel Powell Clayton, Lieutenant colonel Wilton A. Jenkins.

ab.bibl:
Official. Military History of Kansas Regiments: During teh War for the Suppression of teh Great Rebellion, https://babel.hathitrust.org/cgi/pt?id=nyp.33433009260518&view=1up&seq=663, 66-72.
Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kansas, 1861-1865, vol 1., reprint (Topeka, Kansas, 1896), 125-163.
